explain: to change or cause something to change in amount or level, especially from one occasion to another
vary
being the only existing one of its type or, more generally, unusual or special in some way
unique
to be decided by or to change according to the stated thing
depend
better than average or better than other people or things of the same type
superior
a living being, especially an animal
creature
one of the two openings in the nose
nostril
to recognize or be able to tell the difference between two or more things
distinguish
a large group of animals of the same type that live and feed together
herd
to identify someone or something seen before
recognize
a repeated change in the amount or position of something
vibrations

vary

unique

superior

creature
